description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Balloon Blocks is an inviting, easy to play and hard to master Match-3 game that uses soft body physics that give it a unique feel and intuitive game play. The game has 3 game play modes and 3 difficulty levels as well as a custom game mode that gives the player over 100 different combination of options.
